title: Tired of LoL Thinking I'm Queue Dodging.
body:
So I'm in the lobby for the match, we're going through bans, and someone dodges. Turns out it was me. Except... it wasn't. 

This has been happening to me quite a bit. I'm tired of losing LP because of it. I get dropped while in queue over and over, the game often registers this as queue dodging or not pressing Accept. 

If I had a terrible internet connection I wouldn't bother posting this. If I had a terrible internet connection I wouldn't even play ranked.

But I don't.

This issue exists only before the game starts. In game my ping is typically 40-50. Yet, queue is a nightmare for me. It's aggravating as hell to deal with.

replies.body:
Yeesh, that really sounds frustrating. Since your ping in game is steady we can be pretty sure that you've got a good connection. With that being the case, it seems like something is interrupting your connection with that game lobby. 

Let's check some of the most common causes first with this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if that helps keep you in those lobbies!
